com.mindfusion.drawing

Class Font

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.drawing.Font
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Font
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Externalizable
    Provides a platform-independent representation of a font.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

            double size,
            int style)
        Initializes a new instance of the Font class.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the font family.
        size - The size of the font, in points.
        style - One or more of the FontStyles constants.
